Module com.example.proyecto3_
Package com.example.proyecto3_.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.proyecto3_.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Controller for UI and FXML interaction in the game. Delegates all game logic to GameConfig and manages thread execution for machine players.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the game controller. Configures UI elements based on number of bots and starts the game.

    • onDrawFromDeck

      private void onDrawFromDeck()
      Handles drawing a card from the deck. Called when the player clicks the deck button.

    • onCardClicked

      private void onCardClicked(Card card)
      Handles card click by human player. Attempts to play the selected card and updates the UI.
      Parameters:
      card - the card clicked by the player

    • processTurn

      private void processTurn()
      Processes the current turn for human or machine players. Checks game over condition and delegates to appropriate turn handler.

    • executeMachineTurn

      private void executeMachineTurn()
      Executes a machine player's turn using a single thread with delays. Simulates thinking time and plays a card automatically.

    • handlePlayerElimination

      private void handlePlayerElimination()
      Handles player elimination when they cannot play. Removes the player and continues to the next turn.

    • showWinner

      private void showWinner() throws IOException
      Shows the winner screen when the game ends. Transitions to the Win view with the winner's name.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the Win scene cannot be loaded

    • shutdown

      private void shutdown()
      Shuts down all thread pools gracefully. Waits for threads to terminate before forcing shutdown.

    • configureUIForBots

      private void configureUIForBots(int numBots)
      Configures UI visibility based on number of bots. Shows or hides bot areas and loads their images.
      Parameters:
      numBots - number of machine players (1-3)

    • updateUI

      private void updateUI()
      Updates the entire UI with current game state. Called whenever the game state changes.

    • updateLabels

      private void updateLabels(GameModel game)
      Updates all text labels with current game information. Includes table sum, top card, current turn, and statistics.
      Parameters:
      game - the current game model

    • translateCardToSpanish

      private String translateCardToSpanish(Card card)
      Translates a card to Spanish format.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to translate
      Returns:
      Spanish representation of the card

    • translateRank

      private String translateRank(String rank)
      Translates card rank to Spanish.
      Parameters:
      rank - the card rank (J, Q, K, A, or number)
      Returns:
      Spanish translation of the rank

    • translateSuitToSpanish

      private String translateSuitToSpanish(String suit)
      Translates suit names to Spanish (full names).
      Parameters:
      suit - the suit name in English
      Returns:
      Spanish translation of the suit

    • updateTableArea

      private void updateTableArea(GameModel game)
      Updates the table area with card images. Shows the top card and deck with remaining cards count.
      Parameters:
      game - the current game model

    • updateHumanHand

      private void updateHumanHand(GameModel game)
      Updates the human player's hand display. Creates clickable buttons for each card in the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      game - the current game model

    • updateBotHands

      private void updateBotHands(GameModel game)
      Updates the bots' hand displays. Shows card backs for each bot's hand.
      Parameters:
      game - the current game model

    • updateBotArea

      private void updateBotArea(javafx.scene.layout.HBox botArea, Player bot)
      Updates a single bot area with card backs.
      Parameters:
      botArea - the HBox container for the bot's cards
      bot - the bot player

    • createCardButton

      private javafx.scene.control.Button createCardButton(Card card)
      Creates a clickable card button with image and hover effects.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to display
      Returns:
      button with card image

    • createCardImageView

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView createCardImageView(Card card, double width, double height)
      Creates an ImageView for a card.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to display
      width - the desired width
      height - the desired height
      Returns:
      ImageView with the card image

    • createCardBackImageView

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView createCardBackImageView(double width, double height)
      Creates an ImageView for card back.
      Parameters:
      width - the desired width
      height - the desired height
      Returns:
      ImageView with the card back image

    • getCardImageName

      private String getCardImageName(Card card)
      Converts card to image filename.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to convert
      Returns:
      filename for the card image

    • translateSuit

      private String translateSuit(String suit)
      Translates English suit names to Spanish for image filenames.
      Parameters:
      suit - the suit name in English
      Returns:
      Spanish suit name for filename
